p.d: Piper Perry asks her stepfather Ryan McLane if it's OK that she uses his shower since the other one isn't working. Ryan of course has no objections to her being naked and wet in the next room because he has grown to enjoy the perverse fantasy of sniffing his girl's panties. Ryan sneaks into the bathroom while Piper is showering, and quickly takes a huge sniff of her girlsway panties. His obsession with Piper's panties catches up to him when he finally gets caught red-handed.
